# Jason Selwyn
Hello!

I am currently a Ph.D. candidate at [Texas A&M University - Corpus Christi](https://tamucc.edu/) working in the lab of Dr. [Derek Hogan](https://derekhoganresearch.wordpress.com/). My research focuses on understanding the interaction between habitat quality and dispersal dynamics in the Caribbean reef gobies <i>Coryphopterus hyalinus</i>/<i>personatus</i>.
